name: Run jadwalflash.py

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 17 * * *'  # Setiap hari jam 00:00 WIB (17:00 UTC)
  workflow_dispatch:

env:
  TZ: Asia/Jakarta
  LC_ALL: C.UTF-8
  LANG: C.UTF-8

jobs:
  run-jadwalflash:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v4
      with:
        fetch-depth: 0
    
    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v5
      with:
        python-version: '3.10'
    
    - name: Set WIB Timezone
      uses: szenius/set-timezone@v2.0
      with:
        timezoneLinux: "Asia/Jakarta"
    
    - name: Install system dependencies
      run: |
        sudo apt-get update
        sudo apt-get install -y chromium-browser chromium-chromedriver
    
    - name: Install Python dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt
    
    - name: Configure Git
      run: |
        git config --global user.name 'GitHub Actions Bot'
        git config --global user.email 'actions@users.noreply.github.com'
    
    - name: Set up Chrome options
      run: |
        echo "CHROME_BIN=/usr/bin/chromium-browser" >> $GITHUB_ENV
        echo "CHROMEDRIVER_PATH=/usr/lib/chromium-browser/chromedriver" >> $GITHUB_ENV
    
    - name: Run jadwalflash.py
      id: run_script
      env:
        CHROME_BIN: /usr/bin/chromium-browser
        CHROMEDRIVER_PATH: /usr/lib/chromium-browser/chromedriver
        TZ: Asia/Jakarta
      run: |
        set -e
        TIMESTAMP=$(TZ='Asia/Jakarta' date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
        LOG_FILE="logs/jadwalflash_${TIMESTAMP}.log"
        
        mkdir -p logs
        echo "Menjalankan jadwalflash.py..."
        
        if python jadwalflash.py 2>&1 | tee "$LOG_FILE"; then
          echo "jadwalflash.py selesai dengan sukses"
          echo "SCRIPT_STATUS=success" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
        else
          echo "Error saat menjalankan jadwalflash.py"
          echo "SCRIPT_STATUS=failed" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
          exit 1
        fi
        
        # Backup file JSON
        mkdir -p backup_json
        find . -name "*.json" -type f -exec cp --parents {} backup_json/ \;
    
    - name: Commit and push changes
      if: steps.run_script.outputs.SCRIPT_STATUS == 'success'
      run: |
        git add *.json sch/*.json translate/*.json
        COMMIT_MSG="Auto-update: jadwalflash.py $(TZ='Asia/Jakarta' date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z')"
        git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" --date="$(TZ='Asia/Jakarta' date)" || echo "Tidak ada perubahan yang perlu di-commit"
        git push || echo "Tidak ada perubahan yang perlu di-push"
    
    - name: Upload artifacts
      if: always()
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
      with:
        name: jadwalflash-outputs-${{ github.run_id }}
        path: |
          *.json
          sch/*.json
          translate/*.json
          logs/
          backup_json/
        retention-days: 7
    
    - name: Notify on failure
      if: failure()
      uses: actions/github-script@v6
      with:
        script: |
          const { data } = await github.rest.issues.createComment({
            owner: context.repo.owner,
            repo: context.repo.repo,
            issue_number: context.issue.number,
            body: `‚ùå jadwalflash.py gagal dijalankan (Waktu Jakarta: ${new Date().toLocaleString('id-ID', { timeZone: 'Asia/Jakarta' })}).\nSilakan periksa log untuk detail lebih lanjut.`
          })
